texts.text: v0.9.4 alpha was released to fix some of the bugs and crashes in v0.9.3 alpha on iOS and Android. For iOS devices, this version includes changes from v0.9.3.
When returning to the game after locking the device, going to the home screen or switching apps, the game opens up in the pause menu.

2 issues fixed
From released versions before 0.9.0
MCPE-6187 – Baked Potatoes missing name and description
Fixed a crash which occurred after locking the device[1]
"Aw,I’ve just found the source of the crashes I was hunting - turns out I never tried to lock my phone. After that MCPE is really unstable!" – @_tomcc on Twitter, July 17, 2014
